alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Greater Oconee; Greater Pickens; Greenville Mountains; Oconee Mountains; Pickens Mountains (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 4:42AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Habersham, Rabun, southeastern Macon, Transylvania, Henderson, southwestern Polk, southeastern Jackson, northwestern Greenville, northern Pickens and northern Oconee Counties through 515 AM EDT... At 442 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hendersonville to 12 miles southeast of Hiawassee. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hendersonville, Brevard, Walhalla, Clayton, Clarkesville, Mills River, Flat Rock, Etowah, Mountain Home and Laurel Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Greater Oconee; Greater Pickens; Greenville Mountains; Oconee Mountains; Pickens Mountains
